commentBody: Donald Trump's apparent embrace of non briefed, ad hoc phone calls involving world leaders capped off an eventful week. The Oxford English Dictionary chose  "post-truth" as the  word of the year. The timing couldn't be better as Donald Trump's 70+% fabrication rate is an all time record. If Donald Trump continues lying at that rate we can just call it the "post-truth"presidency. The homophobic community must have been giving prayerful thanks, as "fellow phobes" Mike Pence, Mike Pompeo, and Jeff Sessions, were appointed to important Trump administration positions. Mike Pence, who as Indiana governor signed into law, a potentially mandatory "funeral fetus" law, was not asked about his support for the imbecilic Gay Conversion Therapy when he attended "Hamilton" Friday night. He as implored by the cast to protect the inalienable rights of "all Americans."
